spells.name: Dispel Magic
spells.description: Cancels one magical spell or effect.

spells.name: Explosive Runes
spells.description: Deals 6d6 damage when read.

spells.name: Magic Circle against Chaos/Evil/Good/Law
spells.description: As protection spells, but 10-ft. radius and 10 min./level.

spells.name: Nondetection
spells.description: Hides subject from divination, scrying.

spells.name: Protection from Energy
spells.description: Absorbs 12 points/level of damage from one kind of energy.

spells.name: Phantom Steed
spells.description: Magic horse appears for 1 hour/level.

spells.name: Sepia Snake Sigil
spells.description: Creates text symbol that immobilizes reader.

spells.name: Sleet Storm
spells.description: Hampers vision and movement.

spells.name: Stinking Cloud
spells.description: Nauseating vapors, 1 round/level.

spells.name: Summon Monster III
spells.description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

spells.name: Arcane Sight
spells.description: Magical auras become visible to you.

spells.name: Clairaudience/Clairvoyance
spells.description: Hear or see at a distance for 1 min./level.

spells.name: Tongues
spells.description: Speak and understand any language.

spells.name: Deep Slumber
spells.description: Puts 10 HD of creatures to sleep.

spells.name: Heroism
spells.description: Gives +2 bonus on attack rolls, saves, skill checks.

spells.name: Hold Person
spells.description: Paralyzes one humanoid for 1 round/level.

spells.name: Rage
spells.description: Gives +2 to Str and Con, +1 on Will saves, –2 to AC.

spells.name: Suggestion
spells.description: Compels a subject to follow stated course of action.

spells.name: Daylight
spells.description: 60-ft. radius of bright light.

spells.name: Fireball
spells.description: 1d6 damage per level, 20-ft. radius.

spells.name: Lightning Bolt
spells.description: Electricity deals 1d6/level damage.

spells.name: Tiny Hut
spells.description: Creates shelter for 10 creatures.

spells.name: Wind Wall
spells.description: Deflects arrows, smaller creatures, and gases.

spells.name: Displacement
spells.description: Attacks miss subject 50% of the time.

spells.name: Illusory Script
spells.description: Only select creatures can read text.

spells.name: Invisibility Sphere
spells.description: Makes everyone within 10 ft. invisible.

spells.name: Major Image
spells.description: As silent image, plus sound, smell and thermal effects.

spells.name: Gentle Repose
spells.description: Preserves one corpse.

spells.name: Halt Undead
spells.description: Immobilizes undead for 1 round/level.

spells.name: Ray of Exhaustion
spells.description: Ray makes subject exhausted.

spells.name: Vampiric Touch
spells.description: Touch deals 1d6 damage per two levels; caster gains damage as temporary hp.

spells.name: Beast Shape I
spells.description: You take the form and some of the powers of a Small or Medium animal.

spells.name: Blink
spells.description: You randomly vanish and reappear for 1 round per level.

spells.name: Flame Arrow
spells.description: Arrows deal +1d6 fire damage.

spells.name: Fly
spells.description: Subject flies at speed of 60 ft.

spells.name: Gaseous Form
spells.description: Subject becomes insubstantial and can fly slowly.

spells.name: Haste
spells.description: One creature/level moves faster, +1 on attack rolls, AC, and Reflex saves.

spells.name: Keen Edge
spells.description: Doubles normal weapon's threat range.

spells.name: Magic Weapon, Greater
spells.description: Weapon gains +1 bonus/four levels (max +5).

spells.name: Secret Page
spells.description: Changes one page to hide its real content.

spells.name: Shrink Item
spells.description: Object shrinks to one-sixteenth size.

spells.name: Slow
spells.description: One subject/level takes only one action/round, –1 to AC, Reflex saves, and attack rolls.

spells.name: Water Breathing
spells.description: Subjects can breathe underwater.
